text:
Hoping someone has experienced this issue before and knows of a way to resolve.
After moving a project from staging and pushing live, a previously working endpoint is no longer available. The response is acting like the endpoint does not exist at all.
I have verified everything looks correct including the config file, but there has been no change in the error being reported. As this was working as expected previously I am leaning toward this being a bug or otherwise unintended functionality for serverless functions
Are “staging” and “live” referring to difference HubSpot accounts?

<@U26B530N6>, staging link being the content staging url that includes sandbox (ex: <https://www-some-company.sandbox.hs-sites.com/>).
Live being the 'normal' url after publishing the page from 'Content Staging' (ex: <http://www.some-company.com>).

I have found others here having a similar issue, but I am not seeing the 'deploy' action mentioned from the thread in the screenshot below

This seems like a new feature to serverless, as historically this deploy action was not something that was used/or needed to set up a working serverless endpoint from my previous experiences
